short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chibi Anime wallpaper turn new tab to HD Chibi Anime background. Custom Chibi Anime wallpaper theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Rotate through a variety of Chibi Anime wallpapers every time you open a new tab.
2. Choose to randomize your Chibi Anime wallpaper or select your favorites in the wallpaper customization panel.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media accounts for quick access.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick access to frequently visited websites.
8. Easy management of your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add and access favorite websites quickly.
10. Direct links to Google applications.
11. Easy access to additional themes.
12. Simple options for sharing to social media.
13. Convenient wallpaper downloading.
14. Quick links to play games.
15. Enjoy interactive animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks in your Chibi Anime new tab.
